author: legoguy_3000_
title: a good basic set
review:
like orange, I was bored so I built this out of my lego and you can build 7 different ducks (as seen on the picture).

pros:
good colour scheme
easy to build
you can choose which duck you want to build (I built the one in the top left hand corner)

stands up well

cons:
not very exiting
most of them don't look duck-like

a very good set 4/5
